`$=customJS.dv_funcs.mentionedIn(dv)`

A group of [[mental health]] conditions that are characterized by inflexible and unhealthy patterns of thinking, feeling, and behaving.
 ^[[[course_Dr. K's Guide to Mental Health]]]

**See**:: [[mental illness]]
